content:
Side Quest: "The Abandoned Temple"

Problem: The heroes come across an abandoned temple in a remote location. The villagers nearby tell them that the temple was once a place of great power and importance, but has been abandoned for many years. They also tell stories of strange occurrences and cursed artefacts within the temple. The heroes decide to investigate.

Objective:

* The heroes must explore the temple and uncover its secrets
* The heroes must find and deal with any cursed artefacts or dangerous creatures within the temple
* The heroes must discover the reason why the temple was abandoned and what happened to the people who once lived there

Challenges:

* The temple is in a state of disrepair and may be dangerous to navigate
* The heroes may encounter traps and puzzles within the temple that need to be overcome
* The heroes may encounter hostile spirits or creatures that were left behind when the temple was abandoned

Rewards:

* The heroes will gain valuable knowledge about the history and lore of the world
* The heroes may gain valuable treasure or artefacts from within the temple
* The heroes will gain experience and reputation for uncovering the secrets of the abandoned temple.

This quest is a side quest as it doesn't progress the main story but allows for character and world building and allows to explore the history and legends of the world.
